name: SpellBrand Agency
description:
SpellBrand is a Specialist in positioning, identity and inbound marketing, helping entrepreneurs and start ups build their brand, get in front of their target customers and increase revenues. 
 
We do this by helping with the 4 critical aspects of any business:
 
1) Positioning and Brand Strategy - We help brands create a differentiating strategy to be able to enter the highly competitive and saturated apparel industry. 
2) A stunning Logo Design and Brand Identity Design to create the right kind of impact and help you set apart from your competition 
3) A powerful and impactful Website Design to establish your business as a contender and build trust with your target market 
4) Strategic Marketing - both offline and more importantly online with the help of Social Media and Content Marketing.
